  3/** @file    vsip/core/vertex.hpp
  4    @author  Stefan Seefeld
  5    @date    2005-01-20
  6    @brief   VSIPL++ Library: Helper type.
  7
  8    This file declares the a helper template from which other types such as
  9    Index are instantiated.
 10*/
 11
 12#ifndef VSIP_CORE_VERTEX_HPP
 13#define VSIP_CORE_VERTEX_HPP
 14
 15/***********************************************************************
 16  Included Files
 17***********************************************************************/
 18
 19#include <vsip/support.hpp>
 20
 21/***********************************************************************
 22  Declarations
 23***********************************************************************/
 24
 25namespace vsip
 26{
 27
 28template <typename T, dimension_type D> struct Vertex;
 29
 30template <typename T> class Vertex<T, 1>
 31{
 32public:
 33  Vertex() VSIP_NOTHROW : coord_(0) {}
 34  Vertex(T x) VSIP_NOTHROW : coord_(x) {}
 35
 36  T operator[] (dimension_type) const VSIP_NOTHROW { return coord_;}
 37  T &operator[] (dimension_type) VSIP_NOTHROW { return coord_;}
 38
 39  template <typename T1>
 40  friend bool operator==(Vertex<T1, 1> const&, Vertex<T1, 1> const&) VSIP_NOTHROW;
 41private:
 42  T coord_;
 43};
 44
 45template <typename T> class Vertex<T, 2>
 46{
 47public:
 48  Vertex() VSIP_NOTHROW { coords_[0] = coords_[1] = 0;}
 49  Vertex(T x, T y) VSIP_NOTHROW;
 50
 51  T operator[] (dimension_type d) const VSIP_NOTHROW;
 52  T &operator[] (dimension_type d) VSIP_NOTHROW;
 53
 54  template <typename T1>
 55  friend bool operator==(Vertex<T1, 2> const&, Vertex<T1, 2> const&) VSIP_NOTHROW;
 56private:
 57  T coords_[2];
 58};
 59
 60template <typename T> class Vertex<T, 3>
 61{
 62public:
 63  Vertex() VSIP_NOTHROW { coords_[0] = coords_[1] = coords_[2] = 0;}
 64  Vertex(T x, T y, T z) VSIP_NOTHROW;
 65
 66  T operator[] (dimension_type d) const VSIP_NOTHROW;
 67  T &operator[] (dimension_type d) VSIP_NOTHROW;
 68
 69  template <typename T1>
 70  friend bool operator==(Vertex<T1, 3> const&, Vertex<T1, 3> const&) VSIP_NOTHROW;
 71private:
 72  T coords_[3];
 73};
 74
 75template <typename T>
 76inline
 77Vertex<T, 2>::Vertex(T x, T y) VSIP_NOTHROW
 78{
 79  coords_[0] = x;
 80  coords_[1] = y;
 81}
 82
 83template <typename T>
 84inline T
 85Vertex<T, 2>::operator[] (dimension_type d) const VSIP_NOTHROW 
 86{
 87  assert(d < 2);
 88  return coords_[d];
 89}
 90
 91template <typename T>
 92inline T&
 93Vertex<T, 2>::operator[] (dimension_type d) VSIP_NOTHROW 
 94{
 95  assert(d < 2);
 96  return coords_[d];
 97}
 98
 99template <typename T>
100inline 
101Vertex<T, 3>::Vertex(T x, T y, T z) VSIP_NOTHROW
102{
103  coords_[0] = x;
104  coords_[1] = y;
105  coords_[2] = z;
106}
107
108template <typename T>
109inline T
110Vertex<T, 3>::operator[] (dimension_type d) const VSIP_NOTHROW 
111{
112  assert(d < 3);
113  return coords_[d];
114}
115
116template <typename T>
117inline T&
118Vertex<T, 3>::operator[] (dimension_type d) VSIP_NOTHROW 
119{
120  assert(d < 3);
121  return coords_[d];
122}
123
124/***********************************************************************
125  Functions
126***********************************************************************/
127
128template <typename T>
129inline bool 
130operator==(Vertex<T, 1> const& i,
131	   Vertex<T, 1> const& j) VSIP_NOTHROW
132{
133  return i.coord_ == j.coord_;
134}
135
136template <typename T>
137inline bool
138operator!=(Vertex<T, 1> const& i,
139	   Vertex<T, 1> const& j) VSIP_NOTHROW
140{
141  return !operator==(i, j);
142}
143
144template <typename T>
145inline bool 
146operator==(Vertex<T, 2> const& i,
147	   Vertex<T, 2> const& j) VSIP_NOTHROW
148{
149  return i.coords_[0] == j.coords_[0] && i.coords_[1] == j.coords_[1];
150}
151
152template <typename T>
153inline bool 
154operator!=(Vertex<T, 2> const& i,
155	   Vertex<T, 2> const& j) VSIP_NOTHROW
156{
157  return !operator==(i, j);
158}
159
160template <typename T>
161inline bool 
162operator==(Vertex<T, 3> const& i,
163	   Vertex<T, 3> const& j) VSIP_NOTHROW
164{
165  return (i.coords_[0] == j.coords_[0] &&
166	  i.coords_[1] == j.coords_[1] &&
167	  i.coords_[2] == j.coords_[2]);
168}
169
170template <typename T>
171inline bool 
172operator!=(Vertex<T, 3> const& i,
173	   Vertex<T, 3> const& j) VSIP_NOTHROW
174{
175  return !operator==(i, j);
176}
177
178} // namespace vsip
179
180#endif // VSIP_CORE_VERTEX_HPP
